original_text: and standing behind him at his feet, weeping, she began to wet his feet with her tears and wiped them with the hair of her head and kissed his feet and anointed them with the ointment.
korean_text: 예수의 뒤로 그 발 곁에 서서 울며 눈물로 그 발을 적시고 자기 머리털로 닦고 그 발에 입맞추고 향유를 부으니

sentences.original_text: and standing behind him at his feet
she began to wet his feet with her tears
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀는 눈물로 그의 발을 적시기 시작했다

sentences.original_text: and wiped them with the hair of her head
and anointed them with the ointment
